Attributes.description: Anthropological approaches to foodways and agricultural sustainability, particularly small-scale producers and communities. Includes ethnographic analysis of food movements, food systems and the socio-economic contexts of food provisioning and food production. Recommended: Third year status.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00, Building: Allard, Room: Hall
